decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to ramp up mana using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Talismans to quickly cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Devourer of Destiny. The deck focuses on controlling the board with cards like Kozilek's Return and Malevolent Rumble while also utilizing Karn, the Great Creator to disrupt opponents' strategies. The Eldrazi creatures provide powerful win conditions while Sowing Mycospawn generates additional value. The land base includes Eldrazi Temple to further ramp and Sanctum of Ugin to search for more threats.

The key concept of this deck is to control the game and ramp up resources quickly using Eldrazi creatures and spells, while utilizing cards like Karn, the Great Creator to disrupt your opponent's strategies. The deck aims to efficiently cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker, while also utilizing control elements such as Kozilek's Return and Malevolent Rumble to maintain board presence and protect your own threats. The deck's mixture of control and ramp allows for a versatile and powerful gameplay strategy in a Modern format 1 vs 1 setting.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. It utilizes cards like Ajani, Guide of Souls, and Seasoned Pyromancer to create a fast and powerful board presence. The deck also includes tools like Static Prison and Goblin Bombardment to control the battlefield and keep the pressure on the opponent. By combining efficient creatures with burn spells and combat tricks, this deck aims to quickly close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple, to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul and World Breaker. Control the board with cards like Kozilek's Return and Karn, the Great Creator while also disrupting your opponent with Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command. The deck also has a strong synergy with cards like Sowing Mycospawn and Devourer of Destiny, providing additional value and protection for your Eldrazi creatures. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with big, powerful threats while controlling the game.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, removal spells like Fatal Push, and hand disruption with cards like Thought Scour and Sink into Stupor. Murktide Regent provides a powerful threat that can close out the game quickly, while the inclusion of cards like Polluted Delta and Watery Grave ensure consistent mana fixing. The deck also includes creatures like Psychic Frog and Abhorrent Oculus to provide additional utility and ways to control the board. Overall, the deck aims to control the game and win through incremental advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly deal damage and control the board. It aims to utilize a mix of creatures, spells, and enchantments to apply pressure from multiple angles while disrupting the opponent's game plan. The deck includes efficient creatures like Guide of Souls and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, as well as removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm to keep the opponent on the back foot. It also includes cards like Arena of Glory and Static Prison to further control the battlefield and secure a fast victory.

The deck focuses on generating a massive amount of mana quickly through rituals and Medallion effects, while using card draw and selection to find combo pieces. Ral, Monsoon Mage is utilized for additional card advantage and possibly a win condition. Wish allows for flexibility in accessing important cards from the sideboard. Glimpse the Impossible and Reckless Impulse help accelerate the combo. Wrenn's Resolve protects key pieces from removal. The deck aims to storm off with massive spells like Past in Flames, finishing off the opponent with a lethal combo or overwhelming them with massive advantage.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combo potential of Underworld Breach along with various cheap artifacts and card draw effects to generate massive amounts of mana and eventually win the game through a combination of milling and damage. It also includes disruptive elements like Malevolent Rumble and Unholy Heat to control the board and protect the combo. The deck aims to quickly assemble the necessary pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan while building towards a game-winning sequence.

The main concept of this deck revolves around using cards that enable players to quickly cycle through their decks, discard cards, and put creatures like Hollow One onto the battlefield for little to no cost. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive plays and quickly build a strong board presence. Key cards like Burning Inquiry and Faithless Looting help to fuel the graveyard, while creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Detective's Phoenix provide additional threats. The deck also includes removal spells like Lightning Bolt to deal with opposing threats and ensure its creatures can attack freely.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and utilizing graveyard synergy to keep the pressure on. It combines efficient removal spells with disruptive discard spells to control the game, while also including powerful finishers like Emperor of Bones and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The deck aims to quickly establish board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan, ultimately leading to a swift victory through a combination of creature attacks, removal spells, and graveyard recursion.

The deck aims to quickly mill the opponent's library using cards like Archive Trap, Fractured Sanity, and Ruin Crab, while controlling the board with counterspells like Drown in the Loch and removal spells like Fatal Push. Field of Ruin is used to disrupt the opponent's mana base, while Tasha's Hideous Laughter can exile large portions of their library at once. The combination of milling and disruption allows the deck to win by decking out the opponent and emptying their library, rather than reducing their life total to zero.

The deck focuses on using efficient creature removal spells and disruptive creatures to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. It aims to tempo out opponents by deploying threats quickly with Aether Vial and applying pressure with creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd. The deck also utilizes flicker effects like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to gain additional value from enters-the-battlefield triggers. By disrupting the opponent's game plan while developing its own board presence, the deck aims to wear down opponents and secure victory through a combination of aggression and disruption.

This Jeskai Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays, utilizing cards like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Ocelot Pride to quickly build up a strong board presence. The deck also includes red burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to deal direct damage to the opponent and control the board. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah serves as a powerful finisher, while cards like Static Prison and Mockingbird provide disruption and protection. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced, aggressive strategy while maintaining control of the battlefield.
